description: This tombstone is special, if you focus hard enough on one of the inscribed destinations, you will get there instantly. This one is linked to the destinations close to Yharnam.
It is a wooden door with a small glass window on the upper part. Behind it you discern the presence of a woman, you can talk to IOSEFKA (TK).
This is a small lantern with some bells attached to it. It projects its light on the walls, creating eldritch shadows.
You scatter through the shelves and find a handwritten scrawl : "Seek Paleblood to transcend the hunt". Next to another shelf you find two blood vials.

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the scourge beast before you searching the shelves

description: You read "Mingo" on the tombstone, she was probably an ancient hunter. You look around and find 10 quicksilver bullets and 4 blood vials
This is a mechanical lever, you can activate (A) it to unlock the metal gate.

attributes.activationText: You pull the lever, the iron gate next to you opens. You may now freely go to the Graveyard and back.

description: A poor man has been surrounded by the carrion crows you killed, he was certainly overwhelmed and quickly died under their assault. His blood has formed a COLDBLOOD DEW (T) for you to take.

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the crows before you can examine the corpse

description: A tree without any leaves is enthroned in the middle of the courtyard, you look around and find a MADMAN'S KNOWLEDGE (T), hidden near an old well.
You look around the operating room, like the one you awaken in, many beds and blood-covered instruments are here. On one of the beds, you find the CAINHURST SUMMONS (T).
It is a small wooden chest. There nothing that seem to lock it, you can open it (A).

attributes.activationText: You open the chest and find a Communion rune.

description: It is a wooden door with a small glass window on the upper part.

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the celestial emissary before accessing the door
attributes.activationText: You unlock and gently open the door. You may now freely go to Iosefka's clinic and back.

description: This is a mechanical lever, you can activate (A) it to make the ladder drop down.

attributes.activationText: You pull the lever, the ladder drops down. You may now freely go to the Small square and back.

description: You rummage through the coffins, breaking them to find anything valuable. You manage to find 2 blood vials and 6 MOLOTOV COCKTAILS (T)
This is a small lantern, identical to the one you saw in Iosefka's clinic.
You approach the window and hear a man coughing inside the house. You can talk to GILBERT (TK).
This is a mechanical lever, you can activate (A) it to unlock the metal gate.

attributes.activationText: You pull the lever, the iron gate next to you opens. You may now freely go to the Street and back.

description: A tall scourge beast has been hung on the pyre to burn as a warning effigy. Around it there are some abandoned stagecoaches. Among the huntsmen's stuff you found a COLDBLOOD DEW (T)

This a very heavy iron-reinforced door, you can't open it since it is locked. The immediate surroundings are covered in dust because of it's shaking. You found 5 quicksilver bullets and 2 blood vials near it.
Many crated and locked coffins are piled up around the area. You managed to find some useful things such as some MOLOTOV COCKTAILS (T) and a BLOOD STONE SHARD (T).
You try all can but you find nothing around the coffins, only dust and piles of bones, probably victims of the executioner, thinking like you that there would be something of value here.

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the executioner before searching the coffins

description: This is a mechanical lever, you can activate (A) it to unlock the metal gate.

attributes.activationText: You pull the lever, the iron gate next to you opens. You may now freely go to the Small square and back.

description: Trapped prop, no description

attributes.activationText: On the ground in front of the furniture there are some PUNGENT BLOOD COCKTAILS (T), but before you are able to pick them up, you get sprayed with bullet by a grandpa in a wheelchair you thought dead. You took 20 damage. When you recover, you find a note on the furniture, it says "When the hunt began, the Healing Church left us, blocking the great bridge to Cathedral Ward, as Old Yharnam burned to the ground that moonlit night."
attributes.deathDescription: On the ground in front of the furniture there are some PUNGENT BLOOD COCKTAILS (T), but before you are able to pick them up, you get sprayed with bullet by a grandpa in a wheelchair you thought dead. You were too weak to survive and die.

description: You stick your ear to the door and hear an old woman mumbling incomprehensibly. You can talk to the OLD LADY (TK).

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the dogs before going further down the alley

description: Despite surely being very old, this fountain is still in a good state. The water in it doesn't seem drinkable though. Looking around you retrieve 2 blood vials and find some OIL URNS (T)
It is a well that has been dried up for a long time, it is surely not usable anymore but you found 6 blood vials on a nearby bench. You spot a COLDBLOOD DEW (T) not far from here.

You destroy the wooden crates that blocks your path to the metal fence to further examine it. You realise that you can pass through a hole in it to go to the dry dock, but you won't be able to climb back. By smashing the crates you discovered a BLOOD STONE SHARD (T).
You approach the window to look inside the house. There is someone in there. You can talk to the YOUNG GIRL (TK).

attributes.conditionFalseText: The window is on the other side of the iron gate, you need to find a way to open it

description: You smash all the crates you see in the area. You found some BLOOD STONE SHARDS (T) and some PEBBLES (T). You also uncovered a secret path you couldn't see before, it leads to the Sewers' structure, but if you go there you won't be able to come back by the same path.

Wooden beams support the roof, they are quite old and deteriorated. Planks are lined up along the walls to make up a platform to walk on. Behind a broken window there is a rooftop where you spot a hunter, she definitely heard you but doesn't seems to feel threatened. You can talk to EILEEN (TK). With further research you find 3 COLDBLOOD DEWS (T).
Two corpses are chained and hung from the ceiling. You decide to cut the chains to make them fall down. One of them was wearing a SAW SPEAR (T), the other one 2 BLOOD STONE SHARDS (T).
You destroy all the storage boxes inside the facility, in vain. When you finally give up the idea to find anything valuable, you discern a MADMAN'S KNOWLEDGE (T) down in the canal.

Now that the large huntsman is dead, you can safely search the body. You quickly realise that he was a hunter because he still wears his highly recognisable outfit. You can retrieve the HUNTER HAT (T), HUNTER GARB (T), HUNTER GLOVES (T) and HUNTER TROUSERS (T), he also had a THICK COLDBLOOD (T) in his pocket.

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the large huntsman before searching the coffins

description: This is a mechanical lever, you can activate (A) it to unlock the metal gate.

attributes.activationText: You pull the lever, the iron gate next to you opens. You may now freely go to the Fountain square and back.

description: You're digging in the heap of rubbish. This thankless task is not useless because you find 10 quicksilver bullets and a BLOOD STONE SHARD (T)
You climb up the first ladder to reach the platform, a MADMAN'S KNOWLEDGE (T) and 2 OIL URNS (T) are waiting for you to take
You search the half-eaten corpses that were guarded by the man-eater boar. The first body had a COLDBLOOD DEW (T) in his pocket while the second had a special item in hers, a SAW HUNTER BADGE (T).

attributes.conditionFalseText: You must kill the large huntsman before searching the coffins

description: This is an old elevator, you can re-activate (A) it to be able to go to the Small path.

attributes.activationText: You re-activate the elevator. You may now use it go to the Small path and back.
